Module CAViewer
Package sample.model.rules.isotropic.rules

Class INTGenerations

java.lang.Object
sample.model.rules.Rule
sample.model.rules.RuleFamily
sample.model.rules.isotropic.rules.BaseINT
sample.model.rules.isotropic.rules.INTGenerations
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Cloneable, ApgtableGeneratable, MinMaxRuleable
public class INTGenerations
extends BaseINT
implements ApgtableGeneratable, MinMaxRuleable
Implements isotropic non-totalistic (INT) generations rules

      public int dependsOnNeighbours​(int state, int generation, Coordinate coordinate)
      Description copied from class: Rule

      Overrides:

      generation - The generation of the simulation

      Description copied from class: Rule
